price: A kad smo melekima rekli: “Sedždu učinite Ademu!”, svi su sedždu učinili, samo Iblis nije htio.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qul'nā lil'malāikati us'judū liādama fasajadū illā ib'līsa abā
